briefdescription.para: The core of YIN: cumulative mean normalized difference function.

memberdef.argsstring: (int frame_size, float search_threshold, float search_range, int smooth_window)
memberdef.name: yin_init

briefdescription.para: Mark the end of an utterance.

memberdef.argsstring: (int32 *diff_window, fixed32 threshold, int start, int end)
memberdef.name: thresholded_search

briefdescription.para: Feed a frame of data to the pitch estimator.

parameterdescription.para: Frame of frame_size (see yin_init()) samples of audio data.

briefdescription.para: Read a raw estimated pitch value from the pitch estimator.

parameterdescription.para: Output: an estimate of the period (not the pitch) of the signal in samples.
Output: the minimum normalized difference value associated with *out_pitch, in Q15 format (i.e. scaled by 32768). This can be interpreted as one minus the probability of voicing.

simplesect.para: Non-zero if enough data was avaliable to return a pitch estimate, zero otherwise.
